column4: News;The memorial was held in the Children’s hospital Theater in Siem Reap on the afternoon of September 10.------The governor said that the death of Dr. Beat Richner was a great loss
column5: not only for the family but also the loss of an important human resource that has devoted most his life to humanitarian work for Cambodians via The establishment of Kantha Bopha Children’s Hospital and provided free treatment services for children
column6: which contributed significantly to the health sector development in the Kingdom.------Professor BEAT RICHNER died in ------Switzerland on Sept. 9
column7: 2018 at 02:45 AM at the age of 71
